DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial ( RCT ) examine 10 year outcomes compare SCORPIO™ Posterior Cruciate Substituting ( PCS ) versus Posterior Cruciate Retaining ( PCR ) Total Knee Arthroplasty ( TKA ) primary outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Posterior Cruciate Retaining ( PCR ) Versus Posterior Cruciate Substituting ( PCS ) Total Knee Arthroplasty ( TKA )
DOC.detailed_description: RCT 100 subject undergoing primary TKA randomize receive either SCORPIO™ PCS PCR TKA . Subjects evaluate pre-operatively 2 10 year post-operatively use Western Ontario ( WOMAC ) Osteoarthritis Index , RAND-36 knee range motion ( 2 year ) . Complication revision rate also evaluate .
DOC.criteria: schedule primary TKA noninflammatory arthritis intact Posterior Cruciate Ligament time surgery require bone graft either femur tibia varus valgus deformity > 15 degree previous high tibial osteotomy unable understand comply study requirement unable provide sign informed consent
